issue.title: Error on Install
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

On a fresh 3.3.6 joomla on Mysql, when I install EasySDI, I have the error : 

Column count doesn't match value count at row 1 SQL=INSERT INTO `nv_sdi_language` VALUES ('1', '0', '1', 'العربية', 'ar-DZ', 'ar', 'ara', 'ar', 'DZ', 'ara');

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

New error : 

Table 'easysdi_4.3.ha1zi_sdi_sys_server' doesn't exist SQL=INSERT INTO `ha1zi_sdi_sys_server` VALUES ('1','1','1','geoserver' );

You could just test the installation, it takes 5 mn ;-)
